shri lankawa yuropa sangamaye yahapath mithrayeku bawa penwadun ee mahatha me nisama shri lankawa kerehi wishesha awadhanayak yomukarana bawada shri lankawe prathisandhana kriyawaliya mulumaninma kriyathmaka karanu athayi apeksha karana bawada sandahan kaleya.shri lankawe wishalathama apanayana welendapola yuropaya bawada eya dinen dina wardhanaya wemin pawathina bawada penwadun thanapathiwaraya sancharakayin wishala washayen shri lankawata paminenuye yuropa ratawal bawada kiweya.
